results.title: Anti-inflammatory effects of Simvastatin in patients with acute intracerebral hemorrhage in an intensive care unit
results.text_hl: ...The efficacy of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ treatment in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Pancreatitis_Acute_Hemorrhagic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000081032 @@@acute cerebral hemorrhage@@@ was assessed in this clinical study.
